education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering

job-descriptions.item-1: Built a Market Data downloader using Python via Selenium to save time in gathering data.
job-descriptions.item-2: Created a Reporting Program using Excel VBA, reduced time in creating reports
job-descriptions.item-3: Built a market data compiler using Python to be used in compiling data and analysis
job-descriptions.item-4: Monitors the Real-Time Dispatch, Compliances, and Market Prices in MPI.
job-descriptions.item-5: Submission of documents for the Reportorial Requirements and Compliance Post-Evaluation Management Systems (CPEMS).
job-descriptions.item-6: Assist in coordinating with the Operations & Maintenance (O&M), Market Operators, and System Operators and preparation of any-trading related data and documents
job-descriptions.item-7: Assist in coordination with the Buyers on their Nomination (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, and Realtime).

programming-skills.item-1: Python (Flask, Pandas, Selenium, Web Automation, SQLite, SQLAlchemy, Requests, BeautifulSoup4)

certifications.title: 100 Days of Code: The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp for 2023
The Complete SQL Bootcamp: Go from Zero to Hero
Basic WESM Training
certifications.issued-by: Independent Electricity Market Operator of the Philippines, Inc. (IEMOP)

projects.description: An API based resume which can returns info of my resume base on the request from the client
Downloads market data from IEMOP using Selenium. Extracts data from the zip files then transfer the data to the QNAP
Downloads all Operation Logs from MAXIMO by year. Only get the approved logs. Use the unique id from excel to access the log one by one and download it
VBA Program that creates a report base on the IER of the power plant. The inputs will be pass from VBA Excel to Word (Templated Document). Then a report will be created and will be logged
Create a reporting tool that will generate report for every event in the Power Plant.
projects.tech: NodeJS, ExpressJS, EJS, AJAX, PostGreSQL, Bootstrap
